description: [ZxShell](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0412) can launch a reverse command shell.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)(Citation: Talos ZxShell Oct 2014)(Citation: Secureworks BRONZEUNION Feb 2019)
